name: helpdesksystemsequel
description: * Our client 'Make-It-All' has tasked us with the development of a helpdesk system to replace their current manual logging system. * It will be used by 'Helpdesk Operators' alongside 'System Specialists' who can add, update and resolve various problems that personnel in their company are having. * 'Operators' log the calls they receive in the system and create/assign problem tickets to 'Specialists' who are best suited to solve the problem.
